name: Daily News Summarization with OpenAI & Perplexity AI Delivered via Zalo & Telegram
description:
Overview

This n8n workflow automatically fetches the latest news articles from multiple RSS sources, filters for the last 24 hours, summarizes them into a concise ~400-word digest in Vietnamese, and then delivers the result directly to Zalo and Telegram. It‚Äôs designed for professionals who need a quick, AI-curated overview of daily news without manually browsing multiple websites.

üß© Key Features

‚è∞ Triggers

Schedule Trigger: Run at specific times (e.g., morning briefing).

Zalo & Telegram Triggers: Start workflow when requested via chat.

üåê News Collection

Fetches news from 4 RSS sources (RSS.app, Google News, etc.).

Extracts standardized fields (title, pubDate, content).

üîç Filtering & Processing

Keeps only news published in the last 24h.

Limits to 20 most recent items.

Aggregates multiple feeds into one dataset.

üß† AI Summarization

Uses OpenAI Assistant to generate 15‚Äì19 highlights (~400 words).

Translates into Vietnamese, removes special symbols.

Optionally calls Perplexity AI to refine content into a financial‚Äìeconomic‚Äìpolitical style summary.

Maintains short-term context with Memory Buffer for improved output.

üì≤ Delivery Channels

Sends digest directly to Zalo (personal & group chat).

Sends digest to Telegram bot.

‚öôÔ∏è Workflow Steps

Trigger ‚Äì schedule or chat command (Zalo/Telegram).

RSS Fetchers (4 feeds) ‚Äì collect news.

Edit Fields ‚Äì normalize title, date, and content.

Merge & Filter ‚Äì unify feeds, keep only last 24h.

Limit & Aggregate ‚Äì select top 20 articles.

AI Summarization ‚Äì generate digest via OpenAI + Perplexity.

Delivery ‚Äì send results to Zalo & Telegram.

üîê Requirements

‚úÖ RSS source URLs (already set in workflow).

üîë OpenAI API key.

üîë Perplexity API key.

üì≤ Zalo User API + Telegram Bot API credentials.

üì• Example Use Case

A financial analyst or business leader wants a daily briefing in Vietnamese.

At 7 AM, they automatically receive a curated 400-word digest via Telegram and Zalo.

Can also trigger the report on-demand from chat.

üõ† Customization Options

Add/remove RSS sources.

Adjust summary length (short/medium/long).

Output to other channels (Email, Slack, Notion).

Change language from Vietnamese ‚Üí English.

‚ö†Ô∏è Limitations

RSS feeds must be valid & accessible.

Summaries depend on AI quality and may vary slightly.

Perplexity API requires active subscription.

üìå SEO Tags

n8n workflow, rss news summarizer, daily news digest, telegram news bot, zalo ai assistant, openai news summary, perplexity ai, financial political economic news

data.details: The Filter node can be used to filter items based on a condition. If the condition is met, the item will be passed on to the next node. If the condition is not met, the item will be omitted. Conditions can be combined together by AND(meet all conditions), or OR(meet at least one condition).
